WeaponTraitDef.label: water-cooled
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon is encased in a heavy, liquid-filled cooling jacket. It prevents overheating, allowing for much faster sustained fire, but drastically increases the weapon's weight.

WeaponTraitDef.label: bipod
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon features a heavy deployable bipod. It provides extreme stability and accuracy at long range, but the setup time nearly doubles the time it takes to aim.

WeaponTraitDef.label: saturation feed
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon has a modified feed mechanism designed to put as much lead in the air as possible. It doubles the number of shots per burst, but the violent vibration reduces accuracy significantly.

WeaponTraitDef.label: short-stroke piston
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon uses a modified short-travel bolt carrier that strictly limits burst length. It fires half as many shots per volley, but the mechanism resets twice as fast, allowing for extremely responsive engagement.
